product_name: La Roche-PosayLipikar Body Lotion Daily Repair Moisturizing Lotion for Dry Skin
summary: SummaryLa Roche-Posay Lipikar Body Lotion Daily Repair Moisturizing Lotion for Dry Skin with niacinamide, shea butter & glycerin to help alleviate dry skin by restoring moisture all day & replenishing essential skin lipids.

reviews.headline: Decent lotion
reviews.comments: This lotion is light and nourishing, perfect for everyday use. It's not heavily scented, which I appreciate, and it isn't as thick as the version made for very dry skin. It works well for maintaining soft, healthy skin without feeling heavy or greasy.

reviews.headline: I will definitely keep using this product !
reviews.comments: My face is already looking and feeling better after just a week. I will continue to use this and will absolutely recommend to friends.

reviews.headline: I luv this product!
reviews.comments: I love this product. While not too expensive, you can use it all over. It's soft and makes your skin feel soft while moisturizing!!! I ahve used many expensive moisturizers and I think this is better than any others that I have used!!!

reviews.headline: My Holy Grail!!
reviews.comments: I have used this mouisturizer for years!! Keep comming back to it all the time.

reviews.headline: Don't recommend for sensitive skin
reviews.comments: Ive never had problems with La Roche products. I tried using this for two weeks and give it a chance, but every time it burned my fash and gave me a red rash. Really disappointed since the reviews are great.

reviews.headline: I will definitely buy this product again & again
reviews.comments: Love it ! My skin is so hydrated and healthier looking so soft to the touch

reviews.headline: I Would Buy this product again & again
reviews.comments: Don't go a day without it

reviews.headline: I would definitely buy this product again
reviews.comments: I love this stuff and so does my family , I'm so glad I got this , definitely will be buying more and using daily

reviews.headline: My favorite body lotion
reviews.comments: This is my go to body lotion for my sensitive skin. It has improved the texture and health of my skin without any irritation. It's a must for me during the winter months to keep my skin hydrated and happy.

reviews.headline: Works great for dry skin
reviews.comments: I bought this product for my daughter and husband (they have horrible dry skin). They've been using this daily as a body moisturizer. It's been working. After a month of use, they have smooth hydrated skin. I've used it in a hurry on my arms and legs and it feels really good on my skin. It's almost empty and will buy more. I'm keeping this in our household winter moisturizing arsenal.

reviews.headline: Great stuff
reviews.comments: This is the best moisturizer.  Great for dry skin and can use everywhere not just your face.

reviews.headline: Caused bad acne
reviews.comments: Started using about a week ago my whole is broken out in little red pimples.  Never had a lotion break me out

reviews.headline: better than lipikar triple repair
reviews.comments: I really love this. I'm pretty picky with skin products since I worked in the beauty industry for decades and I'm in my 50s. I loved this so much I tried the triple repair thinking it would be even better for dry skin. Nope. This makes my skin feel and look so much better so I came back to this.  It's a perfect staple for long lasting moisture for face or body.. neck especially. It's nice and thick, has no scent and good for sensitive dry skin. Apply on damp skin!

reviews.headline: great for oily skin
reviews.comments: I use this as my daily face moisturizer and it works great. This is a lotion, not a cream, so it's water based and works well for my oily skin because it absorbs quickly without residue. I like that it doesn't make it worse like other moisturizers (also doesn't cure my oiliness but thats not the point). It's an easy pump to grab in the mornings and has lasted me so long. Happy I found this product.

reviews.headline: Trying it out
reviews.comments: Loved the triple moisturizer. Trying this one out. Definitely a lighter cream but keeps face soft and smooth.

reviews.headline: Might break you out
reviews.comments: Every skin is different. The first fee times i used this product i loved it and loved the price. But it ended up ruining my skin, my skin broke out. I now have bunch of red dots on my face. And have stopped using this product. My skin didnt love it, but who know it might work for you.

reviews.headline: I Love it!
reviews.comments: It helps a lot with my extremely dry skin, it doesn't leave me feeling sticky, and my skin stays moisturized all day.

reviews.headline: I wanted to love this
reviews.comments: I wanted to love this product but it pills to bad even with any of the other La Roche Posay products

reviews.headline: Great great great moisturizer
reviews.comments: Absolutely love. I have been using oil moisturizers as I thought they were lighter and absorbed quickly. But this cream is super light and absorbs quickly. it doesn't feel greasy and lasts all day. Now I can really feel the difference when I don't use it. If you are hesitant between this product and the triple repair one for extra dry skin I'd go with this one first. The other is a lot heavier and doesn't absorb as well

reviews.headline: Love this product & solution for remaining 4 0unces
reviews.comments: Again the best body lotion ever! But what to do when the pump won't get to the remaining 4 ounces of lotion. I have a solution! I cut the the top off with a knife, the take a spatula or kitchen knife and scrape it out and into a 4 ounce bell canning jar. Perfect size & then nothing is wasted.

faceoff_positive.comments: So i used to use CeraVe's SA lotion on my face as a daily moisturizer, but they definitely discontinued it, so I've been on the hunt for a new every day moisturizer. I have relatively dry skin, I've only used this about 4 times now, but so far it seems to really moisturize, I've experienced no irritation or breakouts. So i'm really excited about this, and i hope it continues to work for me because this could be my new staple! It feels a little thick and sticky in a way at first, but i find it absorbs very quickly and doesn't leave a heavy residue on the face. though still obvious it's there. Also the smell is pretty awful, it just smells weird, not strong, not fragrant, just not a good smell. But i can overlook it if the product does what it's meant to.
faceoff_positive.headline: New to me, so far so good

faceoff_negative.comments: This product stinks. Thought I would still be able to use it but I can't get past the smell.
faceoff_negative.headline: Stinks.
